page.title: American Academy of Otolaryngology-Head and Neck Surgery (AAO-HNS)
page.content: Featured News 2024 Election Results Thank you for sharing your voice and helping to decide the future of your specialty. The 2024 election results are now in! Find out which leaders were selected to serve your Academy. Learn More Registration Now Open: Cochlear Implants: A Global Perspective Join us for the 2024 Global Grand Rounds Webinar, Cochlear Implants: A Global Perspective, on Saturday, July 27. Topics for discussion include Cochlear Implants and Single-Sided Deafness, Tips & Tricks in Partial Deafness Treatment with Cochlear Implantation, Anatomy-Based Fitting, and Early Activation in CI: Long Term Effect on Impedance. Learn More 2024-2025 FLEX Registration Now Open! The AAO-HNSF’s flagship education product, FLEX—Focused Lifelong Education Xperience, provides the knowledge, education, clinical tools, and professional support to help you meet the challenges of your otolaryngology practice and build mastery throughout your career. Learn More Upcoming Events View All Cochlear Implants: A Global Perspective Saturday, July 27, 2024 at 9:00 am - 10:30 am This webinar will take place July 27, 2024. Registration is now open. AAO-HNSF 2024 Annual Meeting & OTO EXPO Saturday, September 28, 2024 - Tuesday, October 1, 2024 Participate in dynamic networking events and discover the latest advancements in the exhibit hall at the Annual Meeting & OTO EXPO. Hot Topics in Sleep Surgery Saturday, November 9, 2024 at 9:00 am - 10:30 am This webinar will take place November 9, 2024. Stay tuned for the opening of registration. Become an Academy Member today! Join AAO-HNS About Us Our Mission We engage our members and help them achieve excellence and provide high-quality, evidence-informed, and equitable ear, nose, and throat care through professional and public education, research, and health policy advocacy. Learn More Our Initiatives Quality in Practice Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion Public Outreach Campaigns Business of Medicine Research Member Benefits Annual Meeting Discount Publication Subscriptions ENT Connect Access to Reg-ent℠ Opportunities to Get Involved View All Education OTO Logic FLEX CME for MOC Advocacy Federal State Grassroots Health Policy Featured Videos The Florida Otolaryngology Community Welcomes You to Miami Beach for #OTOMTG24 Fred F. Telischi, MD, Maria V. Suurna, MD, Christine T. Dinh, MD, Shekhar K. Gadkaree, MD, William O. Collins, MD, and Camysha H. Wright, MD, invite you to Experience the Extraordinary at the AAO-HNSF 2024 Annual Meeting & OTO EXPO. Please join us Saturday, September 28 – Tuesday, October 1 in Miami Beach, Florida, for the premier event for the specialty. La Comunidad OTO de la Florida le da la bienvenida a Miami Beach para el #OTOMTG24 Roy R. Casiano, MD, Maria V. Suurna, MD y Dominique Bohorquez, MD, lo invitan a Experimentar lo Extraordinario en la Reunión Anual y OTO EXPO de la AAO-HNSF 2024. Únase a nosotros del Sábado 28 de Septiembre al Martes 1 de Octubre en Miami Beach, Florida, para el evento más importante de la especialidad. Update Your Find an ENT Profile “Find an ENT” is a search engine feature on ENThealth.org, the Academy’s patient-oriented website, that allows patients to enter a few details to find an ENT specialist. Take five minutes to update your profile today so patients can get the most accurate information about you and your practice. Registration is now open for the AAO-HNSF 2024 Annual Meeting & OTO EXPO , held S aturday, September 28 – Tuesday, October 1, in Miami Beach, Florida . Learn More Register Now
